          <title>
            <string language="hu">Angyali üdvözlet oltárkép</string>
            <string language="en">The Angelic salutation altar-piece</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das himmlische Begrüßung Altar-Stück</string>

          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Simone Martini: Angyali üdvözlet oltárkép, 1329-1333, Firenze, Uffizi, Tempera, fa, 185 x 210 cm.</string>
            <string language="en">Simone Martini: The Angelic salutation altar-piece, 1329-1333, Florence, Uffizi, Tempera, wood, 185 x 210 cm.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Simone Martini,  angyali üdvözlet,  Trecento,  14. század,  Martini,  </string>

Altar-Stück, 1329-1333, Florenz, Uffizi, Tempera, Holz, 185 x 210

          </description>

de salutation, 1329-1333, Florence, Uffizi, Tempera, bois, 185 x 210
